document_data.caption: A map showing the Tyrant's Road near the Lake of Steam.
document_data.name: Tyrant's Road
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tyrant's Road''', formerly known as the '''Coast Road''' up until [[1370 DR]], was a trail found along the north banks of the the [[Lake of Steam]] in [[south Faerûn]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M"> It was rarely ever featured on [[map]]s made by northerners.
document_data.Description: Tyrant's Road was paved and narrower than the more prominent [[Golden Road]].
document_data.Geography: The trail began where [[Darkhope's Road]] ended in the west at the [[River Mintar]]. The Tyrant's Road cut east along the shore of the Lake of Steam, terminating in [[Saelmur]].<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the name of the road changed to "Tyrant's Road" in reference to [[Teldorn Darkhope]].
